name: Nervous Brickdown
description:
Simple yet deep gaming. 135 levels that can be picked up and played instantly. Nervous Brickdown breaks the mold of breakout games with its rich variety of game play.

It begins with a paddle, ball, and bricks, and then turns into jungles, haunted houses, golf courses, and more. Paddles become submarines, rockets ships, and ghosts. Bricks become ink spots, monkeys, and boss monsters.

Features:

• Fun gaming for everyone: Great for casual games and retro gamers of all ages.
• Simple, hot, and deep: Simple paddle, ball, and brick game play across 10 unique modes and 135 inventive levels
• Creative and crazy: Features a playful variety of levels: Jungles, Classic platform games, space shooter levels. Paddles and bricks transform -- men falling into the ocean, or wads of paper and ink spots -- with each new level concept.
• And crazier: Draw paddles with the pen, blow the ball into bricks, blow bricks into balls, discover hidden levels, and more.
• Also features: Wireless multi-player where two-players can compete in wireless mode, using one game cartridge.
